quality_assessment: Excellent troubleshooting page with accurate source references and practical solutions. Minor improvements possible for visual presentation using MkDocs Material features.

issues.description: Page could benefit from MkDocs Material admonitions for better visual hierarchy
issues.current_content: Uses markdown headers and horizontal rules for section separation
issues.should_be: Use admonitions (tip, warning, info, danger) for symptoms, solutions, and best practices
issues.fix_suggestion: Add MkDocs Material admonitions to improve scannability: use !!! danger for 'Symptoms', !!! success for 'Solution', !!! tip for best practices

issues.description: Could use collapsible sections for detailed debugging workflow
issues.current_content: Plain numbered list for debugging workflow
issues.should_be: Collapsible ??? sections for each debugging step with detailed content
issues.fix_suggestion: Wrap debugging workflow steps in collapsible sections using ??? syntax for cleaner presentation

issues.description: Code examples could have titles and annotations
issues.current_content: Plain fenced code blocks without titles
issues.should_be: Titled code blocks with annotations for key lines
issues.fix_suggestion: Add code block titles using syntax like ```yaml title="Problem: Exponential backoff without cap" and use (1), (2) annotations for key lines

issues.description: Could add tabbed content to group related troubleshooting scenarios
issues.should_be: Tabbed content for related issues (e.g., 'Retry Not Working' tab containing all retry-related issues)
issues.fix_suggestion: Group related issues using === tabbed content syntax for improved navigation

issues.description: Line number reference for max_delay default is slightly off
issues.current_content: Default: max_delay defaults to 30 seconds if not specified (src/cook/retry_v2.rs:64)
issues.should_be: max_delay default is defined in default_max_delay() at line 451
issues.fix_suggestion: Update reference to src/cook/retry_v2.rs:451 for default_max_delay()

issues.description: Line number reference for retry_budget tests is slightly off
issues.current_content: Source: retry_budget enforcement in tests at src/cook/retry_v2.rs:675-708
issues.fix_suggestion: Update reference to src/cook/retry_v2.rs:727-747 for test_retry_budget

positive_aspects: Comprehensive coverage of common retry issues
Accurate source code references with line numbers (e.g., src/cook/retry_v2.rs:128-149)
Clear problem/solution format for each issue
Includes both YAML workflow examples and Rust code examples for programmatic usage
Explains 'why' behind behaviors (e.g., retry_budget doesn't include command execution time)
Covers advanced topics: circuit breakers, thundering herd, error matchers
Good 'Debugging Workflow' section summarizing key checks
Core source references verified accurate against actual retry_v2.rs implementation
Empty retry_on behavior correctly documented (retries all errors)
Default max_delay of 30 seconds correctly documented
Circuit breaker state transitions accurately described
ErrorMatcher matching logic reference at 128-149 is accurate
CircuitBreaker implementation reference at 325-397 is accurate
RetryMetrics struct reference at 399-422 is accurate (actual lines 399-406)
Jitter application reference at 308-317 is accurate
improvement_suggestions: Add admonitions (!!! danger, !!! success, !!! tip) for visual hierarchy
Use collapsible sections (???) for detailed debugging steps
Add code block titles for better context
Consider tabbed content for grouping related issues
Add a quick reference table at the top summarizing common issues and their solutions
Add cross-references to related pages (backoff-strategies.md, jitter-for-distributed-systems.md, etc.)
Fix minor line number references for max_delay default and retry_budget tests
